title: Arma III [R.G. Mechanics]
description:
Date of Release: 12 September 2013

Genre: Action (Tactical / Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person / 3rd Person

Developer: Bohemia Interactive

Publishing House: Bohemia Interactive

Developer Website http://www.arma3.com/

Language: English/MULTi10

Platform: PC [Repack]

Tablet: 3DM

Game Version: 1.20 (Update 16)

Description:

ARMA 3 - a new milestone in the genre of tactical military simulation from independent studio Bohemia Interactive, creators of the acclaimed Operation Flashpoint.
ARMA 3 absorbed all the best from the previous games in the series and has introduced many innovations. New physics engine allows the player to control the unprecedented realism fighting. The new model of behavior technology, the broadest range of weapons, from the already become classic M16 and AK74 before prototypes are not yet enrolled in a wide use, as well as the long-awaited series of fans the opportunity to swim under water.
After several years of exhausting war, Europe has become the last refuge of the battles weakened NATO. Stratis island captured by the enemy on the Middle East and it will gain guaranteed superiority of NATO in the region. Operation has begun, "Magnitude": a small group of specially trained soldiers with scientists undercover sent to the island in the Mediterranean Sea. Mission in danger of collapse! The team is almost completely destroyed, and the main character, Captain Scott Miller washed ashore enemy island. Complete the operation in his power, but his way there all the dangers of modern warfare, ruthless environment and numerical superiority of the enemy. Ponder will have every step!
